FuncDef: This command configures the system wide low watermark threshold for per-ISA throughput in packets/second when an high packet rate alarm will be cleared by the agent. The value must be less than or equal to thepacket-rate-high-wmarkparameter.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the low watermark for packet rate alarms. The value must be lower than or equal to the packet-rate-high-wmark value. Values-0 to 59523807 packets/sec.
